Sentence.sentence: I became aware of the trials of career-focused European woman a few years ago when I met a post-doctoral student from Germany who was then a visiting fellow at Johns Hopkins.
Her best hope in Germany was a government job—prospects for woman in the private sector were dim
In Germany " she told me,"we have all the benefits,"but employers don't wan to hire us.

sentences.en: A century ago,eastern Germany was an agricultural hinterland.
sentences.cn: 一个世纪前,德国东部是个农业的内陆地区。

sentences.en: After the First World War Germany conceded a lot of land to her neighbours.
sentences.cn: 第一次世界大战以后,德国割让了大片土地给邻国。
